column2: an A.M. Eatery////Visit two: Let's start with my freebie from Theresa
column4: paired perfectly with my Molten Chocolate Pancake. Well duh
column5: I wasn't going to pass up that Pancake Flight
column6: a second time. Let me tell you
column7: Theresa described the pancake of the day to me. I thought within me
column8: "that sounds disgusting". I told her go ahead and give it to me; I try super hard to step out of my comfort zone. Usually it's an utter fail.
